rows.label: tlk001201_03_msg0001
rows.name:
The evacuation of the civilians
is proceeding steadily.

rows.label: tlk001201_03_msg0002
rows.name: But I ask that you repair the Sanctus Chain, if possible.

rows.label: tlk001201_03_msg0004
rows.name:
You are now the only ones on
whom we can rely... Do you think
you can do this for us?
